title: Anyone else think Lee Sin's ult Cooldown is kinda stupid
body:
36 Seconds
Winrate aside I played with a (Diamond, which is dumb since I was only silver last season, and the highest person on our team was Gold V, but hey that is another topic) Lee Sin who build AD/semi tanky and had a 36 second ult cooldown
That is being able to knock someone into your team and do 700  INSTANT damage to them
So you can fight, and then kill 2 of them, do baron, and hey it is up again
But honestly why is this in the game

replies.body: The damage on it is kinda stupid.
Not to mention you are unable to move for 2-3 seconds?!?
Yeah, the mini root it has is also pretty lame.  Theres just alot of unnecessary power added into that ability.
No one can flash out of it anyways, so why is it there

Yes but lee sin can get more out of his q by using it to dash to minions or jungle camps compared to morgs binding that you can only use to hit a champion for any benefit.
Yeah just completely fvcking ignore the fact that see said BOTH QSS AND FLASH was a lot for a 36 second cooldown ability .
OK buddy. Too elite to flash if {{champion:53}} hooked I see

OP comments that using 1 summoner spell AND an item active for 1 ability isn't worth it

Then you respond with "OK buddy. Too elite to flash if  hooked I see" not only STILL ignoring the fact of 2 for 1 but now switching from  just QSS use to just Flash use.

Whatever though I know you're stupid,other people know you're stupid, doesn't matter if you're aware.

Using one summoner AND one an item active is 1000% worth it if it saves a carry from dying 40 minutes into a game lmao.

Continue on with the Lee Sin QQ circlejerk though. Not sure why you even care when he's garbage at our ELO anyway

Because it's still a point and click ability even if it has a visual animated delay to it?
People walking out of the way but still being kicked anyways would look weird as fuck.

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EigwElyu,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-31T21:47:20.696+0000)

Yet being hit by a melee auto attack after a flash looks pretty normal to me.
On the other hand, Lee's still going through his kick animation while you "walk away" except then you get kicked and fly anyways.

Make it a short-ranged Skillshot.

Done.
??? Why?

well for one you could kick multiple people, for two that makes it possible to avoid or fuck up, and three you can punt someone at slightly different angles from before depending on the size of the skillshot.

You don't need to kick multiple people though all the time, and if you wanted to, you'd have to learn how to pull off his combo as to have his ult-kicked target hit multiple people in an optimal way. Making it a skillshot completely ruins it and makes it far too easy to avoid with that delayed animation.

It already is possible to avoid and/or fuck up. It's just those who're trash and crying about an equally trash champion don't want to learn how to play.

You can do the same now by just swiveling the mouse and/or flashing after the kick (although I disagree with Lee being able to do the latter personally).

But Lee being able to roundhouse kick someone then immediately flash in whatever direction he wants them go in isn't weird as fuck? 

I don't hate Lee, but that's just a BS interaction.
I disagree with his own Flash interaction.

> 36 Seconds 

No its not lol

>  90 / 75 / 60 seconds

Quoting level 3 ult with max CDR isn't misleading as fuck? Biased much? Can I quote, for example, Veigar's damage with 1200 AP if I wanted to make a thread about it then??

The ult might need a little longer cooldown, but it's 100% fine otherwise.
